Package co.cask.cdap.api.dataset

Defines APIs for accessing and managing data within CDAP.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Dataset Implementations of this class perform data operations on dataset instance.
DatasetAdmin Defines the minimum administrative operations a dataset should support.
DatasetDefinition<D extends Dataset,A extends DatasetAdmin> Defines named dataset type implementation.
 

Class Summary
DatasetProperties Dataset instance properties.
DatasetProperties.Builder A Builder to construct DatasetSpecification instances.
DatasetSpecification A DatasetSpecification is a hierarchical meta data object that contains all meta data needed to instantiate a dataset at runtime.
DatasetSpecification.Builder A Builder to construct DataSetSpecification instances.
 

Exception Summary
DataSetException Thrown when a data operation fails.
 

Package co.cask.cdap.api.dataset Description

Defines APIs for accessing and managing data within CDAP.

Implement DatasetDefinition or Dataset to define custom data set types.

Otherwise, use pre-packaged types available in the co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib and co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.table packages.
